Literature.Title: The Trp-rich Antimicrobial Amphiphiles With Intramolecular Aromatic Interactions for the Treatment of Bacterial Infection
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Li Q, Li J, Shang L, Chou S, Lyu Y, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27583(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27583(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27583(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27583(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
